title: Have you had a reaction following a vaccination?
cleaned_text: Have you had a reaction following a vaccination? - Contact your healthcare provider. [Report an Adverse Event](reportevent.html)using the VAERS online form or the downloadable PDF. New! Important: If you are experiencing a medical emergency, seek immediate assistance from a healthcare provider or call 9-1-1. CDC and FDA do not provide individual medical treatment, advice, or diagnosis. If you need individual medical or health care advice, consult a qualified healthcare provider.
